definition: وطأة waṭ’a pressure; oppression, coercion, compulsion, force; gravity; violence, vehemence │ شديد الوطأة cruel (على to), having a deadly effect (على on), of fatal consequences (على for); اشتدت وطأة الشيء 1078 (ištaddat) to aggravate, become grave, trying, grueling (distress); لاشتداد وطأة المرض li-št. w. il-maraḍ) because of the violence with which the disease struck
